modName: Enderal - Better Ice Claws (English Version) - DELETED
summary: This mod increases the amount of Carry Weight gained from consuming an Ice Claw to five points.
descriptionHtml:
[i][center][color=#ff7700][size=6][b]Enderal - Better Ice Claws (English Version)[/b]
[/size][/color][/center][/i]
[size=3]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][size=3]This mod increases the amount of Carry Weight gained from consuming an Ice Claw to five points. For those who downloaded my old version the FOMOD I created with that version of the mod doesn't work right if you install the mod using the BSA and ESP files because the original script that controls the amount of Carry Weight that an Ice Claw gives is already in the game as a loose script file meaning that it will overwrite the BSA and the mod won't work. I am just now having the time to fix this issue. This new version has no FOMOD and is in Loose File format so it will overwrite the script and the mod will work as intended.

[/size][size=3]At any rate this mod is for English Enderal only but I do not mind at all if someone wants to translate it into a working version for German Enderal. This mod is not retroactive meaning that any Ice Claws you have consumed already before installing the mod will not bump up your Carry Weight. You must start a new game if you want all the Ice Claws in the game to do what this mod has them to do. With that being said I hope you enjoy this mod as it now functions 100% as I originally intended it to do.

[color=#ff7700][b]OPTIONAL FILE:[/b][/color] This version increases Carry Weight that an Ice Claw gives by three points instead of five.

[color=#ff7700][b]UPDATE:[/b][/color] A small update to the 3 point version has been uploaded. I forgot to change the Ice Claw description and the Message Box to reflect the change. It now reads that an Ice Claw gives you 3 points of Carry Weight instead of 5 if you are using the 3 point version.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
author: Dovahkiin1973
